Music Education (BME).1: Understand the role of music in the physical, cognitive, social and emotional development of children and adolescents.
Music Education (BME).2: Integrate into instruction a variety of musical styles including classical, jazz, popular, and world music.
Music Education (BME).3: Acquire effective teacher characteristics in terms of rapport with students, verbal instruction, and nonverbal communication.
Music Education (BME).4: Detect errors in musical performance and devise effective strategies to correct them.
Music Education (BME).5: Build a repertoire of classroom management techniques to use in any music teaching situation.
Music Education (BME).6: Teach with engaging classroom activities and sound rehearsal techniques.
Music Education (BME).7: Develop curricula and plan for instruction in P-12 settings.
Music Education (BME).8: Use assessment appropriately in various educational settings.
